scripts.build: npm run svgo && npm run svg-sprite && npm run build-es6-modules
scripts.svgo: npm run clean-svgo-icons && npx svgo -f src -o dist/icons --config svgo.config.yml
scripts.svg-sprite: npm run clean-svg-sprite && npx svg-sprite --config=svg-sprite.config.json dist/icons/*.svg
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar "src/**/*" -c "npm run build"
scripts.clean-es6-modules: npx trash dist/*.svg.js && npx trash index.js && npx trash dist/esds-icon-names.json
